31.title: The Stick Badge
31.plot: Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

33.title: The Island Badge
33.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

37.title: Episode #2.37
37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: Episode #2.38
38.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

50.title: The Key Badge
50.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

51.title: The Fashion Badge
51.plot: Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!!

52.title: The Glasses Badge
52.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Drawing Badge
1.plot: It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

2.title: The Cake Badge
2.plot: The rabbits are very upset when Happy eats their cake, so Duggee decides to make them a new one with the help of the squirrels.

3.title: The Hair Badge
3.plot: Duggee is having a bad hair day, so the squirrels and Norrie decide to help him.

4.title: The Summer Holiday Badge
4.plot: The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a migrating bird fall from the sky - suitcase and all!

5.title: The Rescue Badge
5.plot: Enid the cat gets stuck when she chases a mouse up a tree, so Duggee and the squirrels rescue her.

6.title: The Super Squirrel Badge
6.plot: The squirrels decide they want to be super squirrels and find themselves special outfits and 'super' names.

7.title: The Jam Badge
7.plot: Duggee decides to make some jam with all his fruit, but just as he gets started Naughty Monkey steals the barrel of fruit and runs off with it.

8.title: The Treasure Hunt Badge
8.plot: The squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby, but they must pass a sea monster and a giant snake to get to the treasure.

9.title: The Scarecrow Badge
9.plot: Tag, Betty, Happy and Norrie help Duggee to build an enormous robot scarecrow while Roly keeps a careful watch on the birds.

10.title: The Funny Face Badge
10.plot: When Whoooooo the Owl is upset, Duggee pulls some funny faces to cheer her up.

11.title: The Bouncing Badge
11.plot: It's Tag's birthday and Duggee has put up a bouncy castle to celebrate. It's a lovely sunny day, and the squirrels are all excited. They're just about to get bouncing - when a big gloomy cloud settles down and falls asleep right over the bouncy castle. How can they wake it up?

12.title: The Leaf Badge
12.plot: The Squirrels go for a woodland walk to help Duggee look for a very special leaf when they hear the strangest noise. In the distance, they can see a funny shape. What is that noise? What is that shape? Is it a monster?!

13.title: The Omelette Badge
13.plot: Duggee decides to make an omelette but there are no eggs in the basket. Where are all the chickens, and why aren't they laying any eggs? The chickens need some exercise! Thank goodness for Hennie the ostrich and her exercise fitness.

14.title: The Food Growing Badge
14.plot: Duggee is sowing seeds. The squirrels ask if they can grow something too. Onion! Carrot! Cucumber! Pumpkin! And strawberry! Who grows what, and how big will they be? One of the squirrels is in for an ENORMOUS surprise!

15.title: The Paddling Pool Badge
15.plot: It's a scorcher of a day. Luckily Duggee has a BIG paddling pool. Yippee! First of all, they need help with blowing up the pool and filling it with water. Thank goodness for Ethel the elephant, she can do everything. Time for the squirrels to have lots of fun.

16.title: The Paper Boat Badge
16.plot: Duggee shows the squirrels how to make a paper boat out of the sheets of his newspaper. As they all look on in admiration an army of ants interrupt - they need help to get across to the other side of the pond so they can join a picnic. Happy comes up with a very good idea...

17.title: The Castle Badge
17.plot: The squirrels and Duggee investigate when they hear a strange voice coming from the castle's spooky tower.

18.title: The Show and Tell Badge
18.plot: Duggee has something really interesting to show the squirrels but it's a bit prickly. The squirrels go off into the garden to find their own interesting things to show and tell, and they all make very different choices. Norrie finds a very special creature with 6 spots...

19.title: The Rocking Horse Badge
19.plot: Duggee is cleaning out his cupboard when he comes across his old rocking horse. He wants to show the squirrels how to ride the horse, but it is very old and needs to be fixed first.

20.title: The Get Well Soon Badge
20.plot: Every episode of Hey Duggie starts with one of the squirrel club members being reminded that it's time to go and see Duggie. This episode starts off with Norrie the mouse, but wait, Norrie is all spotty! Poor Norrie, she doesn't feel well and can't John her friends at squirrel club today. Oh, how can we make our friend feel better? We'll make a card and take it to her! So the remaining squirrel club members climb onto Duggie's back and set off to Norrie's house. On the way they meet some other friendly animals who are also feeling under the weather. ChewChew the panda...

21.title: The Hiccup Badge
21.plot: It's a lovely day, so Duggee and the squirrels are outside. They bump into worm but oh dear! He's swallowed too much mud and he's making a funny noise. Hic! Worm has got the hiccups. The squirrels think it's very funny, until they get the hiccups too...

22.title: The Maze Badge
22.plot: The Squirrels work hard to help Duggee clean his workshop but when they finish they can't find him. Oh! They've built a maze around him!

23.title: The Rain Dance Badge
23.plot: It's a hot day and Duggee's flowers are looking sad. What can perk them up? Some water of course, but there's not a drop to be found. They need a bit of rain, but it's far too sunny today. What about a rain dance?

24.title: The Acorn Badge
24.plot: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree. She thinks it's broken. She soon cheers up when she finds out that some trees shed their leaves in autumn, and actually it's quite good fun playing and jumping in piles of leaves.

25.title: The Balloon Badge
25.plot: Duggee is blowing up balloons for Tino the artistic mouse's birthday. The squirrels are a little worried because Tino can be grumpy. Duggee persuades them all to go and see Tino, but when they give him the balloons, Tino starts to float up into the sky!

27.title: The Hide and Seek Badge
27.plot: The dog and the squirrels decide to play hide and seek and Duggee finds them all except Roly.

28.title: The Sheep Badge
28.plot: There's a sheep in the clubhouse.

29.title: The Spider Badge
29.plot: Norrie discovers a spider in the dressing up box.

30.title: The We Love Animals Badge
30.plot: The squirrels want to find animals to pet and stroke.

32.title: The Decorating Badge
32.plot: The squirrels decorate the clubhouse with Duggee's help.

33.title: The Tidy-Up Badge
33.plot: The squirrels tidy the clubhouse with the help of Duggee and his amazing new vacuum cleaner.

34.title: The Circus Badge
34.plot: The squirrels are excited about the circus coming to town.

35.title: The Egg Badge
35.plot: The squirrels protect a newly born chick.

36.title: The Puppy Badge
36.plot: Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay. He's a cute puppy, but could cause chaos in the clubhouse. And what's that terrible smell?

37.title: The Cardboard Box Badge
37.plot: The squirrels dress up as brave knights in cardboard costumes, but when they go to their castle, they find it already occupied.

38.title: The Caterpillar Badge
38.plot: The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when Tag meets a caterpillar, who eats and eats, getting bigger and bigger.

39.title: The Sandcastle Badge
39.plot: The squirrels learn how to make sand-castles on the beach, and their work turns out to be so impressive that two crabs ask the gang to build them a new home.

40.title: The Football Badge
40.plot: Duggee and the squirrels decide to play football, but the squirrels don't know how to play.

41.title: The Puppet Show Badge
41.plot: Duggee and the squirrels had a great adventure and want to tell everyone. What better way to tell a story than a puppet show?

42.title: The Birdwatching Badge
42.plot: Duggee is using his trusty binoculars to do some bird-watching, and of course the squirrels want to have a go too. The problem is, if you want to go bird watching you have to be very very quiet.

43.title: The Big Parade Badge
43.plot: Duggee introduces the squirrels to his friend Eugene, the leader of the Big Parade. Poor Eugene has lost his hat. Don't worry Eugene, the squirrels will find you a new hat in their dressing up box. And maybe they can join in the parade, too.

44.title: The Be Careful Badge
44.plot: It's a beautiful day and everyone is outside enjoying themselves in the sunshine. Everything is peaceful until Naughty Monkey starts throwing banana skins down from his branch. That won't do at all! Be careful everyone!

45.title: The First Aid Badge
45.plot: The Squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Duggee has his First Aid Badge so he can bandage Tag up. The Squirrels want to help too and they practice their bandaging on Happy.

46.title: The Bubble Badge
46.plot: Duggee has a pot of bubble mixture and he's blowing fantastic bubbles. It's hard to do but the Squirrels get the hang of it eventually. Poor old Happy just can't get the hang of it, until he comes up with an idea, one that will see him make the biggest bubble ever! Just watch out for prickly old Hedgely!

47.title: The Submarine Badge
47.plot: It's a day out for Duggee and the Squirrels as they go on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine.

48.title: The Detective Badge
48.plot: Duggee has made a delicious apple pie. He puts it on the windowsill to cool down but the second his back is turn it's gone. Who took it? Duggee puts on his Detective badge and follows a clue of some small footprints. The Squirrels go off and find lots more clue to help Dugee solve the mystery.

49.title: The Sewing Badge
49.plot: Duggee is sewing. He is making a snazzy Poncho. The Squirrels want to make one too. Everyone begins sewing and it is very quiet in the clubhouse... until they hear a very loud sneeze. Duggee and the Squirrels go off and investigate. They follow the sneezes all the way to a Polar Bear with a bad cold. He needs a hanky. What could they use...?

50.title: The Surprise Badge
50.plot: Duggee and the Squirrels have bought Hennie a present for her birthday, but first they need to wrap it up. It's very big and will need rather a lot of paper and sticky tape. The Squirrels each choose some colourful paper and get wrapping. It's all going well until the very last bit of paper and sticky tape...

51.title: The Teddy Bear Badge
51.plot: Duggee wonders 'Who does that huge Teddy Bear belong to?' That's not a Teddy, it's Beryl and she's a real bear! The Squirrels make her some gifts so she can join the picnic with everyone else.

52.title: The Story Badge
52.plot: The Squirrels tire themselves out with all their activities, so Duggee suggests they take a break and listen to a story.

53.title: The Making Music Badge
53.plot: When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

54.title: The Whistling Badge
54.plot: When Egg, the cheeky little chick, goes on the run again, Duggee whistles to get him back. Hang on a minute Duggee, what was that noise? A whistle? The squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

55.title: The Shape Badge
55.plot: The squirrels are playing a shape game. Working out which shape goes where is tricky.

56.title: The Juice Badge
56.plot: Duggee is going to make the squirrels juice from the garden. While picking the fruit, the squirrels meet a little bug, full of woes about being too small.

57.title: The Footprint Badge
57.plot: The squirrels are playing hide-and-seek, but they can't find Happy. The squirrels follow lots of different footprints that take them to their friend but there is one set they can't work out.

58.title: The Fossil Badge
58.plot: The squirrels are digging in the garden when they come across a fossil, so Duggee and Narrator explain all about fossils and prehistoric times.

59.title: The Treehouse Badge
59.plot: Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the squirrels take refuge in the treehouse, but it's getting a little bit cramped these days. Norrie has an idea - maybe they need to add an extension.

60.title: The Kite Badge
60.plot: It's a very windy day and the squirrels want to play outside. What can they do? Duggee knows - he's flying his kite. The Squirrels set about making their own kites to fly.

61.title: The Tadpole Badge
61.plot: Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

62.title: The Honey Badge
62.plot: Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

63.title: The Pottery Badge
63.plot: When Roly surprises Duggee, Duggee jumps and drops his cup, which shatters into pieces.

64.title: The Teamwork Badge
64.plot: A box full of bits and pieces is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are excited. Duggee and the Squirrels are going to have to work hard to put it all together. Time for a bit of teamwork.

65.title: The Dancing Bug Badge
65.plot: When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing.

66.title: The Train Badge
66.plot: Duggee is playing with his train set. Choo-choo! It's amazing! The squirrels are curious and want to know all about it. Duggee explains that it is a toy but it works exactly like a real train. Hennie arrives and she has a train too. The squirrels ask if they can play with it. You can't play with it; you can play IN it says Hennie.

67.title: The Pizza Badge
67.plot: The Squirrels help Duggee try out his new outdoor pizza oven. Duggee makes the bases, then the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are ... interesting!

68.title: The Medicine Badge
68.plot: Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The Squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the Squirrels don't quite understand, so they ask all the other animals for advice. Does anyone have the answer?

69.title: The Camping Badge
69.plot: Duggee and the squirrels are going camping. They need to find somewhere to pitch their tent but it's not as easy as they thought it would be. They all work together and finally get settled. Then things start to unravel when the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

70.title: The Making Friends Badge
70.plot: The squirrels are off for a Jamboree to make some new friends, play games and have a picnic. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

71.title: The River Badge
71.plot: Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river, and a long way from the clubhouse. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat. Good job Duggee has his River badge!

72.title: The Yoga Badge
72.plot: It's one of those days. The squirrels have arrived and they're all a little bit ... hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

73.title: The Collecting Badge
73.plot: Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, one of the many things he collects. The squirrels inspired to make their own collections. They busy themselves doing the collecting bit, and then display their precious things in the clubhouse.

74.title: The Shadow Badge
74.plot: The sun is setting, and the squirrels are sitting on the sofa. They've had a very busy day. Suddenly all the lights go out! POP! Oh dear, there's been a power cut. The squirrels can't see anything! Thanks, goodness Duggee has got his torch, and he has torches for everyone.

75.title: The Theatre Badge
75.plot: Tino and Eugene are having a disagreement about an amateur dramatic show they want to put on. One wants an all singing all dancing extravaganza while the other, a serious drama. Can Duggee and the squirrels help them get something ready to perform?

76.title: The Memory Badge
76.plot: Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but he's lost it! He's having a problem remembering where he was when it fell out. The squirrels start to look for it but they can't find the tooth anywhere. Time to think carefully and remember!

77.title: The Going Slow Badge
77.plot: The Squirrels are rushing around, so Duggee shows them how to enjoy things at a slower pace. However, they come across Tortoise who needs to get to the hospital as his wife is having babies. Duggee and the Squirrels need to get him there fast!

78.title: The Obstacle Course Badge
78.plot: The squirrels compete in the annual Animal Obstacle Course Race.

79.title: The Spooky Badge
79.plot: The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound.

imdb.title: Hey Duggee
plot: Duggee looks after the Squirrels, who earn different badges on their adventures.
